xml.name: Debug
xml.Text: Now let's learn some debug basics.
xml.Try: Navigate to MasterViewController.swift by pressing GotoFile.
Toggle a breakpoint at line 11 with ToggleLineBreakpoint and then press Debug.
Try to step into, by using StepInto, and then step over with StepOver.
Now, set the caret to line 21 and execute Run to cursor - RunToCursor.
Step over to the next line.
Select controllers[controllers.count-1] and use Evaluate Expression (EvaluateExpression â†’ EditorEnter).
Enter the dot symbol, select some property, and then press EditorEnter to evaluate it without switching to LLDB console.
Press Stop to stop debugging the application.
